document_name: Law on Rational and Efficient Electric Energy Use
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/VEN/2011/VEN-2011-12-19-Law on Rational and Efficient Electric Energy Use_052aa7963dc26361d80ac8e74b44ba59.pdf
document_description: This act requires the government to promote research and development of energy efficiency technologies, allows the government to certify energy efficient technologies accordingly, and requires all sectoral planning to include energy efficiency provisions.
